The mandate amount represents the max value of transaction possible and not the actual deduction. The actual SIP deductions are as per the amount entered during the buy flow. A higher mandate allows for multiple SIPs, if needed, without the need to create new mandates. For daily SIPs, the first transaction will happen instantaneously but the subsequent daily transactions will begin after 2 business days as the mandate registration process takes time to complete"},{"header":"What happens to my gold in the unlikely event of SafeGold going into liquidation?","description":"The title of the gold clearly rests with you and the physical gold stored with Brinks on your account is not an asset of SafeGold in any way. Further, SafeGold has appointed an independent trustee who has the authority to act on your behalf and to protect your interests. The trustee also verifies the quantity and purity of gold. Vistra Corporate Services has been appointed as Security Trustee by SafeGold. Vistra has the first and exclusive charge over your gold held in vaults which means it has a charge over the gold over other commercial creditors till the time of fulfillment of delivery to you.
